page.title: 08POP CULTURE
page.content: {Pop Culture} The two most popular forms of contemporary music in Oadby are New-Wave and Electro.The popular New- Wave groups are Tears for Fears,Frankie Goes To Hollywood and Wham.Synthesised music is also popular with Depeche Mode and Orchestral Manoeuvres In The Dark.Rock music has a fairly good following with the Rolling Stones,Mark Knopfler,Dire Straits and U2 amongst the most popular.Electro is a form of synthesised music with a pulsating fast rhythm.Garage Bands are making a comeback playing in tiny club venues revitalising the 60's psichaedelic sounds using standard guitars,drums and bass.These bands have names like The Grave Digger V,Noise Unleashed and The TV Show.The music is very loud and heavy.
